mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ticket_tb WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY reserved_date DESC

select.if: SELECT t.*, departure_date, arrival_date, reserved_date, departure, destination, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name, tid, amount1 AS amount, status1 AS status FROM ticket_tb AS t JOIN schedule_tb AS s ON t.schedule_id = s.id JOIN route_tb AS r ON r.id = s.route_id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ticket_payment_tb AS tp ON t.id = tp.ticket_id1 WHERE t.id = #{id};

SELECT t.*, departure_date, arrival_date, reserved_date, departure, destination, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name, tid, amount2 AS amount, status2 AS status FROM ticket_tb AS t JOIN schedule_tb AS s ON t.schedule_id = s.id JOIN route_tb AS r ON r.id = s.route_id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ticket_payment_tb AS tp ON t.id = tp.ticket_id2 WHERE t.id = #{id};

mapper.update: UPDATE ticket_tb SET reserved_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.seat_grade,t.member_id,s.departure_date,r.departure,r.destination,a.name as airplaneName, m.status as reqstatus from ticket_tb as t left join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id = s.id left join route_tb as r on s.route_id = r.id left join airplane_tb as a on s.airplane_id = a.id left join mileage_request_tb as m on t.id = m.ticket_id where t.id = #{id};

select.if: select t.id,t.seat_grade,t.member_id,s.departure_date,r.departure,r.destination,a.name as airplaneName, m.status as req_status from ticket_tb as t left join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id = s.id left join route_tb as r on s.route_id = r.id left join airplane_tb as a on s.airplane_id = a.id left join mileage_request_tb as m on t.id = m.ticket_id where t.member_id = #{memberId} and m.status = 0;

select t.id,t.seat_grade,t.member_id,s.departure_date,r.departure,r.destination,a.name as airplaneName, m.status as req_status from ticket_tb as t left join schedule_tb as s on t.schedule_id = s.id left join route_tb as r on s.route_id = r.id left join airplane_tb as a on s.airplane_id = a.id left join mileage_request_tb as m on t.id = m.ticket_id where t.member_id = #{memberId} and m.status = 1;
